item.title: Trump: Will Pardon 'Most' Jan. 6 Defendants During First Hour in WH
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump will pardon "most" Jan. 6 defendants during his first hour back in the White House, he told Time magazine on Thursday.

item.title: Biden Veto Could Stall Expansion of Judgeships

item.title: Trump: Musk Will Put US Before His Companies
item.description: Elon Musk might be the world's richest man, but he "puts the country long before" his companies, President-elect Donald Trump insisted in his intervie...

item.title: N.J. Gets Specialized Radar in Response to Mystery Drones
item.description: As drones continue to circle the skies of New Jersey with no answers as to why, the federal government is sending some help.
